title: We're Hiring: Marketing Operations Manager-Remote
job_overview:
We're Hiring: Marketing Operations Manager - Remote
(US Based Company) | Full-Time - 9am to pm PST | Starting at $10/hr USD | Start Date: Immediate

Ready to Join the Team?
If you're a proactive operator who loves taking ownership, making data-driven decisions, and building systems that scale — apply now. We’re hiring ASAP, and we’re excited to meet someone who wants to grow with us.

Send your CV, Portfolio and a brief 1–2 minute video answering:
1.Why are you interested in this role?
2. Share one paid campaign you managed and what made it successful.

Why This Role Matters
At LeadStream AI, we’re not just filling a seat — we’re building a team of sharp, proactive, and ambitious people who want to grow with us. If you're someone who takes ownership, thinks in systems, and loves turning marketing chaos into organized, revenue-generating machines — we want to work with you.
This is not a freelance gig or a task-based VA role. This is a core operational position where you'll collaborate daily with our automation, sales, and creative teams. You’ll help us scale smarter — not just faster.

Compensation & Perks That Actually Matter

Initial Contract – First 30 Days
$7 USD/hour base pay
Full-time (40 hrs/week) — fully remote & flexible
Performance evaluation at Day 30


After 30 Days (Performance-Based)
Continued contract with full-time commitment
Paid Philippine Holidays
10 Paid Time Off (PTO) Days/Year
6 Paid Sick Leave Days/Year
$20 USD/month Wellness Stipend
Bi-weekly payments (10th & 25th via preferred method)
Performance-Based Growth Opportunities



About LeadStream AI
We’re a fast-growing SaaS + automation agency helping businesses unlock revenue through AI-powered lead generation, marketing automation, and conversational outreach.
We move fast, run lean, and operate like a championship team — not a bloated org chart. Our culture thrives on ownership, execution, and collaboration. We care about each other's energy and results — not micromanagement.

What You’ll Own & Execute

Lead Sourcing & CRM Management
Source 300–500 qualified B2B leads weekly using tools like Apollo, ZoomInfo, Instantly, Clay, etc.
Build segmented lead lists using Ideal Customer Profiles (ICPs)
Enrich, tag, and organize leads in GoHighLevel (GHL) or HubSpot
Maintain CRM hygiene and list compliance


Outbound Campaigns
Set up and optimize email + SMS sequences inside GHL
Work with the marketing team to create conversion-optimized copy
Monitor key KPIs: open rates (30%+), reply rates (10%+), CTRs, and bounce rates
Build campaign performance reports and suggest improvements


Content Repurposing & AI Integration
Use AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, Gemini) to repurpose content for LinkedIn, TikTok, YouTube Shorts
Schedule and manage 3–5 pieces of content per week


Build a content vault in Notion or Google Drive for internal use


Process Documentation & Optimization
Create and maintain SOPs, workflows, and best practices in Notion or ClickUp
Think beyond execution — build systems that scale without bottlenecks



What Success Looks Like
First 30 Days
Launch first outbound campaign
Deliver 1,000+ clean leads in CRM
Begin building SOPs/workflows in Notion or ClickUp


By Day 60
Run weekly campaigns with minimal oversight
Generate reports and recommend improvements
Content is scheduled consistently


By Day 90
Fully autonomous outbound marketing system in place
SOP library built and shared
Potential to begin onboarding/training junior teaUpgrade to see actual infomber



Tools You’ll Use
Apollo · ZoomInfo · Instantly · GoHighLevel · HubSpot · ListKit · ClickFunnels · LinkedIn Sales Navigator · Upgrade to see actual info · Canva · Notion · ChatGPT · Claude · Gemini · Midjourney · Google Workspace · Upgrade to see actual info

You’ll Thrive in This Role If You…
Think in systems, not just tasks
Take initiative and solve problems proactively
Are results-driven, detail-oriented, and consistent
Communicate clearly and professionally
Work well in a remote, collaborative environment
Want to grow into a leadership role as the company scales



Key KPIs & Performance Metrics
300–500 clean leads sourced per week
30%+ email open rate, 10%+ SMS reply rate
3–5 short-form content pieces published weekly
CRM list segmentation and hygiene maintained consistently



Compensation & Career Growth
Monthly Base: $1,600 USD
Paid via Wise, Payoneer, or preferred method
Access to advanced AI and systems training
